text: <@U01QVR44MEY> Thank you, I scheduled meeting at today, 5:00 PM (UTC +2). See you soon! :relaxed:

Hi Team,

I have one landing page, a landing page about calculating some financial values and generating the report when clicking the form submission.
When clicking the report button on the page, we are shown a HubSpot form popup and get the input values of user information (email, name, etc…).

We have configured the auto responder mailer with the download report button. Once the user submitted the form, the mail triggers. The download reports have been saved in the *specific URL*. *Each time different users have done the form submission, the download form will get generated and stored in a website specific link.*

Now I need to send out the report form to unique report to unique users

Issue: How to give the *specific website link as input value in the button component in the emailer.?*

any idea why i would get this issue?
```A StatusCodeError has occurred. 403 - {"status":"error","message":"The scope needed for this API call isn't available for public use. If you have questions, contact support or post in our developer forum.","correlationId":"db2ec234-7260-401b-ad83-b1e7ec0399e3","links":{"support":"<https://help.HubSpot.com/>","forum":"<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/bd-p/integrations>"},"category":"MISSING_SCOPES"}```
what Endpoint are you sending this request to?

{{ personalization_token('contact.website', 'form field') }}, solved by creating personalisation token.

Note: mentioning for references
Youre not allowed to try to gain root access on the HubSpot servers from the CLI. Stop trying to hack into HubSpot. <@U38EZFVFE>

Hi coders, I am learning HubSpot development. I started with local env, but then did many more update in the HubSpot Design Manager (browser based interface). Now, if I want to move back to local and still want to use the latest work I did, what command can I run or how to do I do this. I know people mostly ask question on syncing the remote with local by the command `hs watch`  but I want it the other way around. And I want my local to be overwritten by all progress done in the remote. Please help. Thanks in advance.
